participant_1.background:
I can't stand pizza, but my mom loves it.
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
i really enjoy making friends.
I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee.

participant_2.background:
I clean my glasses when I should be doing other things.
I lost my dog when I was 10 years old.
I am not sure what my ethnicity is, but I do know that I love jello.
my inspiration is classical music.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.

content.text: Hey! It's been great so far! I just finished cleaning my glasses, and I'm about to start watching a nature documentary. What about you?
My day is going well too! I'm getting ready to go for a walk with my dog. I love walking in the woods, but I can't do it as much as I used to because of my disability.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear about your disability. I'm sure it's tough to not be able to do the things you love.
It is, but I'm trying to make the best of it. I've found some other ways to enjoy nature, like watching nature documentaries and reading books about it.
That's great! I'm glad you're able to find other ways to enjoy nature. I love nature documentaries too! I think they're so relaxing.
Me too! They're a great way to de-stress.
So, what kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's the best dog in the world!
Aww, I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and loving.
They are! Buddy is always happy to see me. He's the best friend I could ask for.
I'm glad you have him. He sounds like a great dog.
Thanks! He is. I'm so lucky to have him in my life.
